meanings.sent1: I expended all my energy running in the race.
meanings.sent2: She expended all her money on new clothes.
meanings.sent3: The hungry caterpillar expended all the leaves on the tree.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner expended every ounce of strength to cross the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The campers expended all the firewood to keep warm during the night.

meanings.sent1: The long hike completely expended my stamina.
meanings.sent2: The intense workout session expended all my strength.

meanings.sent4: The busy day at work expended all my mental focus.
